import React, { Component } from "react" import SearchComponent from "./Search" import image from "../images/two-women.jpg" import "../CSS/Main.css" import { Header, Segment, Button, Icon, Grid, Image, Divider } from "semantic-ui-react" class Home extends Component { state = { restaurants: [] } componentDidMount() { this.getRestaurants() } getRestaurants = _ => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/restaurants') .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => this.setState({ restaurants: response.data })) .catch(err => console.error(err)); } renderRestaurant = ({ restrntID, Name, Phone, Address, Website, Delivery }) => render() { return (
Welcome to Fortisure Foods

Find your City!

 {restaurants.map(this.renderRestaurant)}
) } } export default Home
